fields.name: NOTICE_DATE
fields.doc: date and time of notice creation

fields.name: TRIGGER_NUM
fields.doc: string of alpha and digits uniquely identifying event

fields.name: SEG_NUM
fields.doc: Swift serial number (for Swift notice types only)

fields.name: SRC_RA
fields.doc: ra of GRB/Transient in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: SRC_DEC
fields.doc: dec of GRB/Transient in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: TRIGGER_INDEX
fields.doc: id number of successful trigger criteria

fields.name: GRB_PHI
fields.doc: phi orientation of GRB/Transient wrt BAT instrument [deg]

fields.name: GRB_THETA
fields.doc: theta orientation of GRB/Transient wrt BAT instrument [deg]

fields.name: RATE_SIGNIF
fields.doc: strength of rate domain at time of trigger [sigma]

fields.name: IMAGE_SIGNIF
fields.doc: strength of image domain at time of trigger [sigma]

fields.name: LC_URL
fields.doc: full URL of the BAT GRB Lightcurve

fields.name: MISC_19
fields.doc: 32 Flag Bits. See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of bits, some bits may not be defined
